text: Minoo Mumtaz (born Malikunnisa Ali; 26 April 1942 â€“ 23 October 2021) was an Indian actress and dancer. Mumtaz appeared in many Hindi movies of the 1950s and 1960s. Mumtaz was born in Mumbai, India. Her career began in 1954. Her best known roles were in Kaagaz Ke Phool, Sahib Bibi Aur Ghulam and Gazal. Mumtaz died of cancer at a hospital in Toronto, Canada on 23 October 2021 at the age of 79.Mehmood's sister Minoo Mumtaz passes away in Canada ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian dancers Category:Actors from Mumbai
title: Minoo Mumtaz
